item.title: Lexical Conceptual Representations in Bicultural Bilinguals
item.description: This project has been published on Bilingualism: Language and Cognition: Pan, X., Xiong, A., Jouravlev, O., & Jared, D. (2021). Conceptual representations in bicultural bilinguals: An ERP approach. Bilingualism: Language and Cognition, 24(5), 932â€“944. and has been presented at the Psychonomics Society 2015 Annual Meeting, Chicago, USA: Jared, D., Xiong, A., Pan, X., & Jouravlev, O. (2015, November). Lexical conceptual representations in bicultural bilinguals. The Psychonomics Society 2015 Annual Meeting, Chicago, USA.
